desc: Welcome to Mom's Heart Malaysia. We offer high-quality baby clothing for an affordable price! Our clothes are locally designed and made, curated for you and your baby. Value for money baby clothing, proudly made in Malaysia! You can find us in Aeon, Sogo, Parkson and Manjaku. #babyclothing #babyclothingmalaysia

layout.text: Welcome to Mom's Heart. A family brand started in 2001 in hopes of bringing comfort and style to little one's all over Malaysia.
